title: Remove claude-mem references from documentation
description: Remove all claude-mem setup, configuration, and references from README.md, QUICK-START.md, and CONTEXT-MANAGEMENT.md. Replace with DevRag-based approach.

title: Integrate DevRag for vector search
description: Add DevRag MCP server setup to documentation. Include: installation instructions, .devrag-config.json template, .gitignore entries, per-project setup, and global MCP configuration in ~/.claude.json. Document semantic search capabilities.

title: Implement drafts/archive workflow for scenes
description: Add support for out-of-order writing. Create scenes/drafts/ and scenes/archive/ directories. Implement /new-scene --draft flag. Create /scenes promote command to move drafts to active scenes. Create /scenes archive command. Update scene frontmatter to include status field. Update /scenes list to show drafts/archive.

title: Add notes/decisions.md tracking system
description: Create notes/decisions.md template for tracking major plot/story decisions. Update /session end to prompt for recording decisions. Add /decisions command for viewing/adding/searching decisions. Include date, decision description, affected scenes, and reasoning in each entry. Integrate with DevRag for searchability.

title: Update CONTEXT-MANAGEMENT.md with new architecture
description: Rewrite CONTEXT-MANAGEMENT.md to reflect DevRag-based approach. Remove claude-mem sections. Document 4-layer system: DevRag (vector search), Session Tracking, Codex, Project Files. Add sections on: human-readable vs LLM-readable storage, drafts/archive workflow, decisions.md tracking. Include retrofitting instructions for existing projects.

title: Update /new-project command for new features
description: Modify /new-project to create scenes/drafts/ and scenes/archive/ directories. Generate .devrag-config.json with proper configuration. Create notes/decisions.md template. Update .gitignore to exclude .devrag/. Ensure all new directory structures and files are created on project initialization.

title: Convert writing system to Claude Code plugin
description: Transform the writing system into a distributable Claude Code plugin. Tasks: 1) Create .claude-plugin/ directory with manifest.json and marketplace.json, 2) Move commands/ and subagents/ to plugin structure, 3) Add package.json for npm publishing, 4) Create installation documentation (local, GitHub, npm), 5) Set up versioning (semantic versioning), 6) Test local installation and functionality, 7) Prepare for GitHub publishing, 8) Document plugin update workflow.

title: Auto-log session chat transcripts with DevRag indexing
description: Automatically save Claude Code chat transcripts to notes/sessions/YYYY-MM-DD-session-N.md at session end. Include timestamp, word count delta, topics discussed. DevRag auto-indexes for semantic search. Enables natural queries like 'what did we discuss about magic system last week?' without manual logging overhead. Integrate with existing /session end hook.
